main: ^Power Princess : my friend, trapped on the other side of this wall. How I miss them.

info: ^Power Princess : Lilac! I miss her. She was kinda funny, trying to change the world and such

info2: ^Power Princess : Noone can go into the ballpit without it. Pretty sad huh?
